channel.title: [pi] friends list bug
channel.description:
yo guys, if i add someone to my friends list it says there offline when there offline and it like lags/kicks me like 10 seconds after i add someone to it and when i log back in they are off my friends list, please help.
i does anyone know how to add wildy outside of east varrock bank and dummys? thanks
server base: pi
